sections.spanish: ...el infinito no puede ser la eternidad

sections.original: Oblivion beneath, passion of all pity,
sections.spanish: Olvido por debajo, pasión de toda piedad,

sections.original: can't you see, there's no beloved
sections.spanish: ¿no lo ves? no hay un amado

sections.original: they're just helpless, another pale abuse
sections.spanish: solo están indefensos, otro pálido abuso

sections.original: o. we can't, we hold our fault
sections.spanish: o. no podemos, sostenemos nuestra culpa

sections.original: help me, I wasn't your heaven
all you, all your tears you've once shed
sections.spanish: todo tú, todas tus lágrimas que una vez derramaste

title.original: ...And How To Drown In Your Arms

sections.original: I can't bleed more for you
sections.spanish: No puedo sangrar más por ti

sections.original: but you mustn't shed more tears for
sections.spanish: pero no debes derramar más lágrimas por

sections.original: so my abuse is your tired mask
sections.spanish: así mi abuso es tu máscara cansada

sections.original: and the cure is not fast enough for
sections.spanish: y la cura no es lo suficientemente rápida para

sections.original: me to give you any poise or
sections.spanish: que te ofrezca algo de compostura o
y la venganza es la vida
...Así que abraza las flores del otoño

sections.original: which will ever weep over landscapes wide and grey
sections.spanish: que siempre llorará sobre paisajes amplios y grises

sections.original: and feed the rivers flowing into the waters of life
sections.spanish: y alimentará los ríos que fluyen hacia las aguas de la vida

sections.original: though oblivion is a mightier water -
sections.spanish: aunque el olvido sea un agua más poderosa –

sections.original: so majestic, so cold, so fathomless deep...
sections.spanish: tan majestuoso, tan frío, tan insondablemente profundo...

sections.original: The past is all what we will
sections.spanish: El pasado es todo lo que seremos
llegar a ser, para entronizarlo todo

sections.original: what will be, to flow in nothing
sections.spanish: lo que será, para fluir en la nada

sections.original: and if there is a god, everyone
sections.spanish: y si existe un dios, todos

sections.original: for him, not to forget life...
sections.spanish: para él, no para olvidar la vida...

sections.original: ...And so we take the gift of crying
sections.spanish: ...Y así tomamos el don del llanto

sections.original: and bask in the fire of past
sections.spanish: y nos deleitamos en el fuego del pasado

sections.original: the wish will fall at last

sections.spanish: ...Así que esta es la elección más dulce

sections.original: embrace the stigma of the voice
sections.spanish: abraza el estigma de la voz

sections.original: the kiss of life the kiss of death
sections.spanish: el beso de la vida, el beso de la muerte

sections.original: disarm the fear of all the pain
sections.spanish: desarmo el miedo a todo el dolor

sections.original: when all what hurts is slowly rotten
sections.spanish: cuando todo lo que duele se pudre lentamente
es la ganancia del jardín de los símbolos

sections.original: ...And now it's the triumph of leaving
sections.spanish: ...Y ahora es el triunfo de irse

sections.original: take farewell of all the griefing
the only real love is between your grace
sections.spanish: el único amor verdadero está en tu gracia

sections.original: take a look behind the gates
sections.spanish: echa un vistazo más allá de las puertas

sections.original: black is blue and haze is haze...
sections.spanish: lo negro es azul y la bruma es bruma...

sections.original: but tears are a part of you
sections.spanish: pero las lágrimas son parte de ti

sections.original: for all what you are dying for
sections.spanish: por todo por lo que estás muriendo

sections.original: it's the only thing you can decide
sections.spanish: es lo único que puedes decidir

sections.original: o. you forget the breathes, forget
another skin, it's the piece of
sections.spanish: otra piel, es el fragmento de
de algún modo indefenso, ¿no es así?

sections.original: my final soul, for your sun
sections.spanish: mi alma final, para tu sol

sections.original: but this could mean the earth to me
sections.spanish: pero esto podría significar todo para mí

sections.original: and if everything seems like spring
it's often just a dream of
sections.spanish: a menudo es solo un sueño de

sections.original: breathing liquid of all, and just
sections.spanish: respirar líquido de todo, y solo

sections.original: but only the time of eternity is
sections.spanish: pero solo el tiempo de la eternidad es

sections.original: able to heal the bottomless wound
sections.spanish: capaz de sanar la herida insondable

sections.original: o. what harm to be inbalanced
sections.spanish: o. qué daño hay en estar desequilibrado

sections.original: to fall down, this is the only real part
sections.spanish: caer, esta es la única parte real

sections.original: what it seems to be, and the
sections.spanish: lo que parece ser, y el

sections.original: balance is the end of eternity
sections.spanish: equilibrio es el fin de la eternidad
